txt.en: 'The King Under the Mountain has shown us such kindness...'
'I must rest more...'
'It is good to finally rest...'
Ailing Stout-axes can be found in the Hall Under the Mountain.\n\nYou have gathered 'healing draughts' and dried cloaks for the ailing Stout-axes and should now deliver them.
Delivered 'healing draughts' and cloaks to ailing Stout-axes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You have aided the ailing Stout-axes.
Completed
DNT
You have done well to aid the ailing Stout-axes in Erebor and eased the ills of their long journey north from Mordor.

'Hail! What news have you from Ambassador Spakorth?'

You explain that King Thorin has asked the Stout-axes for their aid in return for granting them a new home in Erebor.

'King Thorin is a very generous dwarf, indeed! I will send as many Stout-axes as I can, but a few of our number have taken ill from the long journey to the North. We were beset by heavy rains before we arrived, and our cloaks were drenched. I do not know if that is the source of their ailments, but it did not help!

'If you could, bring their warmed cloaks to them. I left our cloaks by several of the forges and fires in the Hall, so they should not be hard to find. Also, I think they could do with a 'healing draught' or two, if you understand my meaning.

'Thank you, [placeholder]. You have done so much for us... I hope we can return your kindness one day.'
Collected 'healing draughts' for ailing Stout-axes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected dried cloaks for ailing Stout-axes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT
With a few of his folk ailing from the long journey to Erebor, Náth hopes to raise their spirits.
Collect 'healing draughts' for ailing Stout-axes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect dried cloaks for ailing Stout-axes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Ah, this is just what I needed....'
A Costly Journey
'Thank you, friend...'
Deliver 'healing draughts' and cloaks to ailing Stout-axes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Dried cloaks can be found near various fire-pits and forges in the Hall Under the Mountain. 'Healing draughts' can be found on feasting tables in the Hall Under the Mountain.\n\nNáth hopes to help ailing Stout-axes by giving them 'healing draughts' and the warmth of a dried cloak.
